      • getWeapons

        public java.util.List<WeaponCard> getWeapons()
        Returns:
        the between 0 and 3 weapons present in the set.

      • addWeapon

        public void addWeapon(WeaponCard weapon)
               throws OutOfSlotsException,
                      WeaponAlreadyPresentException
        Adds a weapon to the set.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon to add to the set.
        Throws:
        OutOfSlotsException - when there are already 3 weapons present in the set.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when trying to add a weapon already present in the set.
        WeaponAlreadyPresentException

      • removeWeapon

        public void removeWeapon(WeaponCard weapon)
        Removes a weapon from the set.
        Parameters:
        weapon - The weapon to remove from the set.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if weapon is not present in the set.

      • equalWeaponSet

        public boolean equalWeaponSet(WeaponSet weaponSet)
        Compares the set to another weapon set.
        Parameters:
        weaponSet - the set to compare
        Returns:
        boolean value stating if the sets include the same weapons.

      • copyWeaponSet

        Copies the weapon set.
        Returns:
        a new equal instance of weapon set.
